1184240.name: They Can't Stop All Of Us - Outfits Pack
1184240.description:
You're an Area 51 Raider and you Want to Gear up Proper


I get it. You've been raiding for awhile now.

You want the status that comes with rarities.

You want something to make you stand out in the crowd of noobs.

You want to express your style and impress your teammates.

And you want something that's going to make you play better.

Whether you're a silent assasin, a boistrous rifleman, or a humble but wealthy assault class, This outfit DLC can give you everything you want and much more.

If you've been thinking about buying this DLC, STOP. Click Buy Now


From Blake:

"As part of wanting to give back to the extremely active players of the game, you can now get outfits in-game!

This system was created to reward players who have been playing the game since release or who have put in many hours!

The goal is to be rewarding so that long-term players have something to look forward to, but still fast enough that everyone can enjoy.

If you don't want to wait and want to help support the game consider getting this pack! "

No pre-determined outfits!

Tired of outfit or skin packs that give you a pack but you may only like one or two? This pack instantly gives you 10,000 latinum which you can spend however you want on anything you like!

And best of all, you're helping support an indie content creator!

Help Charity

For the first week of this DLC's release a portion of all sales will be going to #teamtrees, a charity started by YouTuber Mr. Beast who plans to plant 20,000,000 trees by the end of the year!
1184240.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
